settings.text: When it comes to opening a new gym, consulting a specialist property expert will save valuable time and money. That's why we partnered with Genesis Coordination.

Genesis Coordination has provided commercial gym space solutions for over 10 years. Professional athletes and international sports people have trusted us for a decade to create the perfect training space for them. We can do the same for you.

Genesis Coordination steers new and existing operators through by identifying our customersâ€™ specific needs, drawing up workable business plans, formulating the right strategy to search for, and secure suitable sites.


Our property expert partners have helped many brands secure new operating sites, like Pure Gym, Anytime Fitness and more. Genesis assisted Ben Dunne Gyms in entering the UK market and opening sites across the country. Not only that, but they structured their leases in a format which aided the sale of the business to JD Gyms.

settings.left-text: With your budget and business plan in mind, Genesis will negotiate lease terms aligned to your business strategy. Coupled with expert advice from Reiver Fitness, you can be confident that your best interests are at the heart of every plan. Our turn-key solution will guide you through the entire process of opening a commercial gym space.
settings.right-text: Better yet, having an experienced property lawyer represent you pays dividends in delivery timelines. It also helps with landlord and tenant responsibilities. Reiver Fitness can help by introducing you to experienced property solicitors with your best interests in mind.

settings.text: If you need the services of interior designers, fit out consultants and project managers, Reiver Fitness can help. Get in touch today.
